title: Stray Bullets And Street Violence, 'Sadvertising,' And Meshell Ndegeocello
teaser: Assessing the toll of stray bullets on American communities, how advertisers woo customers with tears and emotion, and a live performance and conversation with musician Meshell Ndegeocello.
contentencoded:
Assessing the toll of stray bullets on American communities, how advertisers woo customers with tears and emotion, and a live performance and conversation with musician Meshell Ndegeocello. All that and more are on this week's podcast edition of weekends on All Things Considered.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
